LEXSense.DefinitionShort: = man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God
= inanimate object created by God and therefore bound by his laws as if it were a human being
= class of slaves working in the temple; ◄ possibly captives of war set apart for service in the temple by Solomon
= man; ► father of {L:Gaal<SDBH:גַּעַל>}; time of the Judges

= man; ◄ son of {L:Jonathan<SDBH:יְהֹונָתָן>}; descendant of {L:Adin<SDBH:עָדִין>}; ► one of the family heads who accompanied {L:Ezra<SDBH:עֶזְרָא>} back to {L:Jerusalem<SDBH:יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם>} after the exile
